Text:
Was waiting for your release... cheers mate!

I wish you had put this on the same scale as your "The Avengers" rip (at around 8 GB) cause that was nothing short of mind-blowing!

But even at 3800 kbps encoding for this one, this still looks superb! 

Thanks 3Li! :) :) :)
1080p @ 4.7 GB please.. come on 3Li... 5 GB is not worth a 720p, 720 only at around 2 GB file size only plz... Make 1080p at 4.7 GB file size plz :((
sorry man, this it's final encode.

3li, can you please make 1080p @ 5gb from now onwards please ?
Before you used to make 720p @ 3gb which were as good as these... So Please make 1080p @ 5 GB plz.. from now onwards please :D
